title: Kim Kardashian models new SKIMS underwear line with Sofia Richie
text:
Kim Kardashian has released new images from her SKIMS cotton collection.

The 38-year-old Mrs Kanye West was seen brushing her teeth in her massive bathroom of her $60M mansion when she wore a grey two piece. And she was also seen sitting on the floor in a darker bra.

The siren also enlisted the help of Scott Disick's girlfriend Sofia Richie to model the black SKIMS underwear.

Another shot: Kim Kardashian has released new images from her SKIMS cotton collection. The 38-year-old Mrs Kanye West was seen brushing her teeth in her massive bathroom of her $60M mansion when she wore a grey two piece

In her very big bathroom: Last week the daughter of Kris Jenner, 63, shared this image

The first photo came from her SKIMS Instagram account.

The caption said, 'Kim wears the Cotton Rib Tank ($34, available now in select sizes in Iris Mica and Mineral) and the Cotton Rib Brief ($28, available now in select sizes in Bone, Mineral, Kyanite, and Soot).'

The Selfish author is by her double sinks and there are two grey chairs behind her.

A touching moment: Another new shot sees her in a dark grey SKIMS bra as she adds oversized shorts. The beauty is touching her forehead as she models heavy makeup with her long hair worn down

Deja vu: This very similar image was released several days ago on social media

Another new shot sees her in a dark grey SKIMS bra as she adds oversized shorts.

The beauty is touching her forehead as she models heavy makeup with her long hair worn down.

The KKW Beauty owner also has on white sneakers and thick socks.

Sofia also shared a SKIMS look on Snapchat.

A yoga position? This image where Kim is looking at her cell phone while curled up on the floor was shared on Tuesday

Another look at SKIMS on Kim: This image was shared over the weekend

Sitting pretty at home: And the model sat down in her closet for this pose

The daughter of Lionel Richie wore a black bra and added leggings for a very sporty daytime look.

She was outdoors and carrying a beverage for the quick clip.

Last week Kim looked sultry as she modeled a white bra and leggings while reclined on a large, round white sofa with pillows strewn about in her Hidden Hills, California mansion she shares with Kanye West and their four children.

Scott's gal made it: Sofia also shared a SKIMS look on Snapchat. The daughter of Lionel Richie wore a black bra and added leggings for a very sporty daytime look

Look at my body folks: . She was outdoors and carrying a beverage for the quick clip

The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star was announcing the launch of her SKIMS Cotton Collection, which debuted on October 15 online.

'My essential underwear and lounge pieces made from ultra soft cotton are coming soon!' said the Selfish author.

She then warned her 149M Instagram followers that the line will likely sell out fast.

Unwinding: Kim looked sultry as she modeled a white bra and leggings while reclined on a large, round white sofa with pillows strewn about in her Hidden Hills, California mansion she shares with Kanye West and their four children

'The SKIMS Cotton Collection is inspired by Kardashian’s favorite pieces for relaxing at home, and includes essential tees, tanks, leggings, slips, bras and underwear made from soft and natural fibers in muted, flattering tones,' a press release states.

The SKIMS Cotton Collection sees classic bra and underwear styles 'modernized to combine the cool, everyday comfort and natural breathability of cotton with high-tech support,' it was added.

Cotton lounge is intended for layering and everyday casual wear, with ribbed tanks, thermal leggings, sporty boxers and slip dresses, it was also suggested.

Going soon: 'My essential underwear and lounge pieces made from ultra soft cotton are coming soon!' said the Selfish author before warning her 149M Instagram followers that the line will likely sell out fast

The look up close: 'The SKIMS Cotton Collection is inspired by Kardashian’s favorite pieces for relaxing at home, and includes essential tees, tanks, leggings, slips, bras and underwear made from soft and natural fibers in muted, flattering tones,' a press release states. The SKIMS Cotton Collection sees classic bra and underwear styles 'modernized to combine the cool, everyday comfort and natural breathability of cotton with high-tech support,' it was added

Sizing for the collection ranges from XXS through 4XL in keeping with the brand’s emphasis on inclusivity.

SKIMS Cotton is priced from $18 for the Dipped Thong to $56 for the Balconette Bra.

The Cotton Collection comes in five colors: Bone, Mineral, Iris Mica, Soot, and Kyanite.

Earlier this week it was announced that Kim hopes to move production of her Skims range to Armenia in an attempt to bring more business to the Eurasian country, which borders Iran and Turkey.

The reality star, who visited Armenia with her children and sister Kourtney, revealed in a Reuters interview: 'I'm really excited because tonight I have a meeting to talk about future investments and how to open up a factory here and how to really bring business to Armenia.'

The move comes after Kim was criticized for selling products made in Turkey. During and after the First World War, Turks engaged in ethnic cleansing of Armenians during attempts to establish a nationalist Turkish state from the ruins of the Ottoman Empire.

Making plans: Kardashian reveals she's 'excited' to open Skims factory in Armenia... after being criticized for making products in Turkey; she was interviewed while in Armenia

New business: Kim said she was unaware that some of her Skims range was made in Turkey. And the siren said she was most concerned from the start about the quality of the product

Kim herself has called for the U.S. government to officially recognize the Armenian Genocide, as it is widely known.

Kim said she was not involved in the decision to manufacture products in Turkey, explaining: 'I actually wasn't really a part of production at the beginning.'

She explained she was presented with 'tons of samples from many different factories and I picked quality. I didn't ask like 'Well where's each one made?' and no one thought to tell me until after production.'

She looks good in SKIMS too: Kylie Jenner modeled one of Kim's SKIMS designs and said she was 'obsessed'
description: The 38-year-old Mrs Kanye West was seen brushing her teeth in her massive bathroom of her $60M mansion when she wore a grey two piece. And she was also seen sitting on the floor.
